mapper.sql: id, boxes, cargo_id, cargo_name, cargo_no, contract_amount, contract_id, contract_money, cost_price, create_date_time, create_user, expect_store_boxes, expect_store_weight, invoice_amount, invoice_money, level, real_store_boxes, real_store_money, real_store_weight, status, unit_price
mapper.select:
select a.*,b.external_contract,b.inside_contract from cargo_info a inner join contract_base_info b on a.contract_id = b.contract_id where a.status = '1'
and b.external_contract like '${contractNo}%'
and b.inside_contract like '${insideContract}%'
and a.level = '${level}'
and a.cargo_name = '${cargoName}'
and a.cargo_no like '${cargoNo}%'
order by a.id desc limit ${start},${limit}

select count(1) from cargo_info a inner join contract_base_info b on a.contract_id = b.contract_id where a.status = '1'
and b.external_contract like '%${contractNo}%'
and b.inside_contract like '%${insideContract}%'
and a.level = '${level}'
and a.cargo_name = '${cargoName}'
and a.cargo_no like '${cargoNo}%'
mapper.insert: insert into cargo_info (id, boxes, cargo_id, cargo_name, cargo_no, contract_amount, contract_id, contract_money, cost_price, create_date_time, create_user, expect_store_boxes, expect_store_weight, invoice_amount, invoice_money, level, real_store_boxes, real_store_money, real_store_weight, status, unit_price ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{boxes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cargoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cargoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cargoNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{costPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{createDateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expectStoreBoxes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{expectStoreWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{invoiceAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{invoiceMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realStoreBoxes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{realStoreMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{realStoreWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE} )

boxes,

update cargo_info
boxes = #{boxes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cargo_id = #{cargoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cargo_name = #{cargoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cargo_no = #{cargoNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
